content:
Groups and Households (Managed Package)

Groups (Householding) gives you the flexibility to organize your customers in ways that are meaningful to you.

This feature is available in Salesforce orgs that have installed the Financial Services Cloud managed package. A group can give insight into a customerâ€™s financial circles, such as a household with its family members and professional connections.

Record rollups work by updating the Household field on child object records. Select Update Records Silently when configuring record rollup to avoid updating Last Modified By and Last Modified Date fields.

Set Up Relationship Groups (Managed Package)

* Set up relationship groups to let advisors add individuals to more than one group, add businesses to groups, and visualize relationships.
* Create Expanded Account Relationships in Group Builder (Managed Package)
	+ Create business and personal account relationship hierarchies using the enhanced Account Account Relationship object.
* Configure the Group Builder Edit Window (Managed Package)
	+ View, create, and update records that are part of a household group.
* Customize Roles for Person Accounts and Individuals (Managed Package)
	+ Customize roles that person accounts and individuals play as members of a group.
* Configure Reciprocal Roles (Managed Package)
	+ Describe the role of one entity relative to another entity within a relationship.
title: Household Groups in Financial Services Cloud
